description: You can customize the TeamsFx config for different environments. Visit https://aka.ms/teamsfx-env-config to learn more about this.

description.full: Sample application to demonstrate the capabilities of TeamsJS in Microsoft Teams apps extended across Outlook and Microsoft 365. For more information visit [SDK documentation page](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/javascript/api/overview/msteams-client?view=msteams-client-js-latest&tabs=npm)
